response.overview: Acclaimed photographer Howard Roffman goes behind the scenes of his stunning book THREE with this video diary of Kris, John and Gary. These three American boys have formed a loving three-way relationship in London. The photo book was just the beginning, as they candidly discuss the challenges, joys and intimacies of being three young men in love with each other - and they expose every aspect of their unique bond to the camera. This documentary should not be missed!
response.title: Three
